contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement| official_name = Quintanilla Vivar | nickname = | settlement_type = [[Municipalities of Spain|Municipality]] and town | image_flag = Bandera Quintanilla Vivar.svg| image_seal = Escudo Quintanilla Vivar.svg| image_map = | map_caption = | subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] | subdivision_name = [[Spain]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Autonomous communities of Spain|Autonomous community]] | subdivision_name1 = {{flagicon|Castile and León}} [[Castile and León]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Provinces of Spain|Province]] | subdivision_name2 = [[File:Burgos Flag.jpg|20px|Flag of Burgos]] [[Burgos (province)|Burgos]] | subdivision_type3 = [[Comarca]] | subdivision_name3 = [[Alfoz de Burgos]] | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_magnitude = | area_total_km2 = 13.38 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_m = 849 | population_as_of = 2012 | population_note = | population_total = 770 | population_density_km2 = 57.55 | timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset_DST = +2 | latd=42|latm=24|lats=52|latNS=N|longd=3|longm=41|longs=22|longEW=W | website = http://www.quintanillavivar.es/ | footnotes = | }} {{Unreferenced|date=March 2009}} '''Quintanilla Vivar''' (formerly known as '''Quintanilla Morocisla''') is a municipality located in the [[Burgos (province)|province of Burgos]], [[Castile and León]], [[Spain]]. == Demography == From the early 1991's the city itself has led to the recovery of the population, with many people, work and city life, but has found a home in the village at a better price in the city. According to the 2009 [[census]] ([[Instituto Nacional de Estadística (Spain)|INE]]), the municipality has a population of 741 inhabitants. {| align="center" rules="all" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="4" style="border: 1px solid #999; border-right: 2px solid #999; border-bottom:2px solid #999" |+ style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.1em; margin-bottom: 0.5em"| Recent demographic development ! 1991 !! 1996 !! 2001 !! 2004 !! 2007 !! 2009 |- | align=center|306||369||554|| align=center|581|| align=center|679|| align=center|741 |} [[File:Quintanilla Morocisla.jpg|thumb|200px|left|Church of [[Eulalia of Mérida|Saint Eulalia of Mérida]], in Quintanilla Vivar.]] {{Municipalities in Burgos}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of Burgos]] [[Category:Populated places in the Province of Burgos]] {{Burgos-geo-stub}}
